column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnatis was recommended to us by a lift driver so we decided to check it out. Being it our first time in Chicago
column2: we ordered the classic deep dish pizza. It was yummy but (in MY opinion) extremely cheesy
column3: though those in my group seemed to enjoy that. Our server was also great and attentive. The large pizza was plenty to feed 4
column4: we actually had enough left over to have it for dinner. Overall
column5: this place was good and I would maybe visit again
column6: but I would order something with a little more meat
